name: Word Jumble Farm
description:
Word Jumble Farm is an anagram and word jumble game. Rearrange the letters to find the answer using the clue for help. This is a light version of the game, with the full version available for mobile devices.

Play by dragging and dropping letters or clicking to quick move.

The full game can be found at:

App Store (iOS)

Google Play (Android)


Full version includes over 1700 puzzles, multiple word categories and more animals to unlock.
